name: Laundromatic
description:
This is a first-person tower-defence game where you must set up cleaning towers to create the most efficient laundry system. 

  • Place different towers, upgrade them, and if you like, control them yourself. 
  • Deal with a variety of clothes as levels get harder and harder.
  • Choose from a number of maps with different layouts.

Group members
